remarks: Alternate form of ` OutsideOf ` .  Definition 6.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 43.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: broutsideof2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( P OutsideOf <. A , B >. <-> ( A =/= P /\ B =/= P /\ ( A Btwn <. P , B >. \/ B Btwn <. P , A >. ) ) ) ) $.
